title: Contact
body:
**Minas Cristais** is located in the city of Sete Lagoas, Minas Gerais, Brazil, a region known for the production of high quality crystals and minerals.

Its history begins, more than 30 years ago, in 1991, with a small lapidary.

In 2011, it opened its virtual store, expanding its sales throughout Brazil and around the world.

Today, Minas Cristais has become a reference in the market and part of the connection between people and nature.

In 2018 we opened the Store located in Curvelo/MG, where you can buy both retail and wholesale.

Store of **Sete Lagoas** was expanded in 2020 to better serve the public.

Store in **Belo Horizonte**, opened on April 10, 2021, Av. Augusto de Lima, 744 â€“ Store 109 (Central Market of Belo Horizonte).

### **What we offer:**



Currently, **Minas Cristais** keeps in stock a huge variety of different types and qualities of minerals, gems, handicrafts and decoration items.

We offer in addition to numerous types of crystals and semi-precious, we also have handicrafts in other stones such as agate and soapstone.

Accessories such as pendants, necklaces, rings and bracelets you can also find in our stores.

All our products come from nature and are therefore unique. With that in mind, we always try to keep our web page up to date so that our customers can view all available parts. On our Instagram you can also follow the news and products available.

We provide true, accurate information about sizes and weights for you to choose your products of interest well.

If you need different images, more detailed information, we will gladly send them via email or whatsapp.

If you don't find what you're looking for here, feel free to contact us, we'll check our stock and assemble your order according to your needs.

### Our goal:



Minas Cristais aims to promptly serve its customers, offering carefully selected and high quality products, with attractive prices, in the shortest delivery time.

We are always updating ourselves in the market, including technologies, to be available building relationships online, through social networks and whatsapp.
.

We have a personalized service by Whatsapp to answer all questions related to purchase orders, products, from Monday to Friday from 9 am to 5 pm

On our social media channels, Instagram, Tik Tok, Facebook and Youtube, we are always available to talk to you and bring you relevant content about our products, curiosities and behind the scenes of what happens here in stores. We hope to see you there too :)



### Our Goal:




To increasingly serve our customers and new customers in Brazil and abroad. Keeping the quality standard that we have been able to achieve in these years of work.

Return to performing at Fairs and Exhibitions in Brazil and abroad as we did before the Pandemic,

Taking our products, gems, semi-precious and stone handicrafts throughout Brazil and abroad.

Always looking for updates on the technological and logistical side, bringing you faster and faster delivery of products consumed online.

Minas Cristais - Transparency is our business!
